config.name: selectOnFocus
config.desc:
True to select any existing text in the field immediately on focus.  Only applies
when editable = true (defaults to false)

config.name: md
config.desc: colspan out of 12 for computer-sized screens

config.name: dataId
config.desc: cutomer id

config.name: capture
config.desc: use for file input only. (default empty)

config.name: can_build_overlaid
config.desc: True if element can be rebuild from a HTML page

config.name: queryDelay
config.desc:
The length of time in milliseconds to delay between the start of typing and sending the
query to filter the dropdown list (defaults to 500 if mode = 'remote' or 10 if mode = 'local')

config.name: minLength
config.desc: Minimum input field length required (defaults to 0)

config.name: triggerAction
config.desc:
The action to execute when the trigger field is activated.  Use 'all' to run the
query specified by the allQuery config option (defaults to 'query')

config.name: resizable
config.desc: True to add a resize handle to the bottom of the dropdown list (defaults to false)

config.name: mobileTouchView
config.desc: show mobile touch view when using a mobile default true

config.name: labelmd
config.desc: set the width of label (1-12)

config.name: editable
config.desc:
False to prevent the user from typing text directly into the field, just like a
traditional select (defaults to true)

config.name: defaults
config.desc:
currency of the MoneyField
value should be in lkey

config.name: listeners
thousandsDelimiter
config.desc: Symbol of thousandsDelimiter

config.name: castInt
config.desc: cast int if true (defalut true)

config.name: listWidth
config.desc: The width in pixels of the dropdown list (defaults to the width of the ComboBox field)

config.name: alwaysQuery
config.desc: Disable caching of results, and always send query

config.name: handleHeight
config.desc: The height in pixels of the dropdown list resize handle if resizable = true (defaults to 8)

config.name: visibilityEl
config.desc: What element to use for visibility (@see getVisibilityEl())

config.name: emptyResultText
config.desc: only for touch device

config.name: title
config.desc:
If supplied, a header element is created containing this text and added into the top of
the dropdown list (defaults to undefined, with no header element)

config.name: allowZero
config.desc: False to blank out if the user enters '0' (defaults to true)

config.name: style
config.desc: any extra css

config.name: max_length
config.desc: Maximum input field length allowed (defaults to Number.MAX_VALUE)

config.name: minValue
config.desc: The minimum allowed value (defaults to Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY)

config.name: maxLength
config.desc: Maximum input field length allowed (defaults to Number.MAX_VALUE)

config.name: after
config.desc: - input group add on after

config.name: name
config.desc: name of the input

config.name: queryParam
config.desc: Name of the query as it will be passed on the querystring (defaults to 'query')

config.name: tpl
config.desc: The template to use to render the output

config.name: disableClass
config.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").

config.name: selectedClass
config.desc: CSS class to apply to the selected item in the dropdown list (defaults to 'x-combo-selected')

config.name: autocomplete
config.desc: - default is new-password see: https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/input/form/label-and-name-inputs?hl=en

config.name: hasFeedback
config.desc: default true

config.name: actionMode
config.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el'

config.name: validator
config.desc:
A custom validation function to be called during field validation (defaults to null).
If available, this function will be called only after the basic validators all return true, and will be passed the
current field value and expected to return boolean true if the value is valid or a string error message if invalid.

config.name: hiddenName
config.desc:
If specified, a hidden form field with this name is dynamically generated to store the
field's data value (defaults to the underlying DOM element's name)

config.name: sm
config.desc: colspan out of 12 for tablet-sized screens

config.name: autoCreate
config.desc:
A DomHelper element spec, or true for a default element spec (defaults to:
{tag: "input", type: "text", size: "24", autocomplete: "off"})

config.name: allowNegative
config.desc: False to prevent entering a negative sign (defaults to true)

config.name: removable
config.desc: special filter default false

config.name: minChars
config.desc:
The minimum number of characters the user must type before autocomplete and typeahead activate
(defaults to 4, does not apply if editable = false)

config.name: animate
config.desc: default true

config.name: btnPosition
config.desc: set the position of the trigger button (left | right) default right

config.name: validationEvent
config.desc:
The event that should initiate field validation. Set to false to disable
      automatic validation (defaults to "keyup").

config.name: disableClear
config.desc: Disable showing of clear button.

config.name: container_method
config.desc: method to fetch parents container element (used by NavHeaderbar -  getHeaderChildContainer)

config.name: xs
config.desc: colspan out of 12 for mobile-sized screens

config.name: lazyRender
config.desc:
True to prevent the ComboBox from rendering until requested (should always be used when
rendering into an Roo.Editor, defaults to false)

config.name: labelsm
config.desc: set the width of label (1-12)

config.name: indicatorpos
config.desc: default left

config.name: minLengthText
config.desc: Error text to display if the minimum length validation fails (defaults to "The minimum length for this field is {minLength}")

config.name: labelxs
config.desc: set the width of label (1-12)

config.name: listAlign
config.desc:
A valid anchor position value. See {@link Roo.Element#alignTo} for details on supported
anchor positions (defaults to 'tl-bl')

config.name: showToggleBtn
config.desc: show toggle button or not (true|false) default true

config.name: invalidFeedbackIcon
config.desc: The CSS class to use when create feedback icon (defaults to "x-form-invalid")

config.name: triggerList
config.desc: trigger show the list or not (true|false) default true

config.name: xattr
config.desc: extra attributes to add to 'element' (used by builder to store stuff.)

config.name: forceFeedback
config.desc: Default false

config.name: mode
config.desc: Set to 'local' if the ComboBox loads local data (defaults to 'remote' which loads from the server)

config.name: maskRe
config.desc: An input mask regular expression that will be used to filter keystrokes that don't match (defaults to null)

config.name: typeAhead
config.desc:
True to populate and autoselect the remainder of the text being typed after a configurable
delay (typeAheadDelay) if it matches a known value (defaults to false)

config.name: disableKeyFilter
config.desc: True to disable input keystroke filtering (defaults to false)

config.name: triggerText
config.desc: multiple combobox trigger button text default 'Select'

config.name: allowDomMove
config.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

config.name: regexText
config.desc: -- Depricated - use Invalid Text

config.name: fieldLabel
config.desc: - the label associated

config.name: minText
config.desc: Error text to display if the minimum value validation fails (defaults to "The minimum value for this field is {minValue}")

config.name: disabled
config.desc: is it disabled

config.name: triggerClass
config.desc: An additional CSS class used to style the trigger button. The trigger will always get the class 'x-form-trigger' by default and triggerClass will be appended if specified.

config.name: validClass
config.desc: DEPRICATED - uses BS4 is-valid now

config.name: modalTitle
config.desc: The title of the dialog that pops up on mobile views.

config.name: accept
config.desc: use for file input only. (default empty)

config.name: validateOnBlur
config.desc: Whether the field should validate when it loses focus (defaults to true).

config.name: valueField
config.desc:
The underlying data value name to bind to this CombBox (defaults to undefined if
mode = 'remote' or 'value' if mode = 'local'). 
Note: use of a valueField requires the user make a selection
in order for a value to be mapped.

config.name: allowBlank
config.desc: False to validate that the value length > 0 (defaults to true)

config.name: focusClass
config.desc: The CSS class to use when the field receives focus (defaults to "x-form-focus")

config.name: store
config.desc: The data store to which this combo is bound (defaults to undefined)

config.name: invalidClass
config.desc: DEPRICATED - uses BS4 is-valid now

config.name: listClass
config.desc: CSS class to apply to the dropdown list element (defaults to '')

config.name: displayField
config.desc:
The underlying data field name to bind to this CombBox (defaults to undefined if
mode = 'remote' or 'text' if mode = 'local')

config.name: inputType
config.desc: button | checkbox | email | file | hidden | image | number | password | radio | range | reset | search | submit | text

config.name: tooltip
config.desc: Text for the tooltip

config.name: tickable
config.desc: ComboBox with tickable selections (true|false), default false

config.name: specialFilter
config.desc: special filter default false

config.name: emptyTitle
config.desc: default ''

config.name: typeAheadDelay
config.desc:
The length of time in milliseconds to wait until the typeahead text is displayed
if typeAhead = true (defaults to 250)

config.name: loadingText
config.desc:
The text to display in the dropdown list while data is loading.  Only applies
when mode = 'remote' (defaults to 'Loading...')

config.name: size
config.desc: - (lg|sm) or leave empty..

config.name: caret
config.desc: a fontawesome for the trigger icon see http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

config.name: hideTrigger
config.desc: True to hide the trigger element and display only the base text field (defaults to false)

config.name: minListWidth
config.desc:
The minimum width of the dropdown list in pixels (defaults to 70, will be ignored if
listWidth has a higher value)

config.name: invalidText
config.desc: The error text to display if {@link #validator} test fails during validation (defaults to "")

config.name: multiple
config.desc: ComboBobArray, default false

config.name: placeholder
config.desc: - placeholder to put in text.

config.name: before
config.desc: - input group add on before

config.name: blankText
config.desc: Error text to display if the allow blank validation fails (defaults to "This field is required")

config.name: readOnly
config.desc: Specifies that the field should be read-only

config.name: hideMode
config.desc:
How this component should hidden. Supported values are
"visibility" (css visibility), "offsets" (negative offset position) and
"display" (css display) - defaults to "display".

config.name: vtype
config.desc: A validation type name as defined in {@link Roo.form.VTypes} (defaults to null)

config.name: maxHeight
config.desc: The maximum height in pixels of the dropdown list before scrollbars are shown (defaults to 300)

config.name: maxValue
config.desc: The maximum allowed value (defaults to Number.MAX_VALUE)

config.name: mobile_restrict_height
config.desc: restrict height for touch view

config.name: allowDecimals
config.desc: False to disallow decimal values (defaults to true)

config.name: nanText
config.desc:
Error text to display if the value is not a valid number.  For example, this can happen
if a valid character like '.' or '-' is left in the field with no number (defaults to "{value} is not a valid number")

config.name: valueNotFoundText
config.desc:
When using a name/value combo, if the value passed to setValue is not found in
the store, valueNotFoundText will be displayed as the field text if defined (defaults to undefined)

config.name: validFeedbackIcon
config.desc: The CSS class to use when create feedback icon (defaults to "x-form-invalid")

config.name: decimalSeparator
config.desc: Character(s) to allow as the decimal separator (defaults to '.')

config.name: autoFocus
config.desc: auto focus the first item, default true

config.name: lg
config.desc: colspan out of 12 for large computer-sized screens

config.name: pageSize
config.desc:
If greater than 0, a paging toolbar is displayed in the footer of the dropdown list and the
filter queries will execute with page start and limit parameters.  Only applies when mode = 'remote' (defaults to 0)

config.name: useNativeIOS
config.desc: render it as classic select for ios, not support dynamic load data (default false)

config.name: forceSelection
config.desc:
True to restrict the selected value to one of the values in the list, false to
allow the user to set arbitrary text into the field (defaults to false)

config.name: labelWidth
config.desc: set the width of label

config.name: append
config.desc: default false

config.name: validationDelay
config.desc: The length of time in milliseconds after user input begins until validation is initiated (defaults to 250)

config.name: labellg
config.desc: set the width of label (1-12)

config.name: allQuery
config.desc: The text query to send to the server to return all records for the list with no filtering (defaults to '')

config.name: cls
config.desc: css class

config.name: blockFocus
config.desc: Prevents all focus calls, so it can work with things like HTML edtor bar

config.name: shadow
config.desc: True or "sides" for the default effect, "frame" for 4-way shadow, and "drop" for bottom-right

config.name: maxText
config.desc: Error text to display if the maximum value validation fails (defaults to "The maximum value for this field is {maxValue}")

config.name: maxLengthText
config.desc: Error text to display if the maximum length validation fails (defaults to "The maximum length for this field is {maxLength}")

config.name: value
config.desc: default value of the input

config.name: regex
config.desc:
A JavaScript RegExp object to be tested against the field value during validation (defaults to null).
If available, this regex will be evaluated only after the basic validators all return true, and will be passed the
current field value.  If the test fails, the field will be marked invalid using {@link #regexText}.

config.name: align
config.desc: Default left

config.name: decimalPrecision
config.desc: The maximum precision to display after the decimal separator (defaults to 2)

methods.name: select
methods.desc:
Select an item in the dropdown list by its numeric index in the list. This function does NOT cause the select event to fire.
The store must be loaded and the list expanded for this function to work, otherwise use setValue.

params.name: index
params.desc: The zero-based index of the list item to select

params.name: scrollIntoView
params.desc:
False to prevent the dropdown list from autoscrolling to display the
selected item if it is not currently in view (defaults to true)

methods.name: expand
methods.desc: Expands the dropdown list if it is currently hidden. Fires the 'expand' event on completion.

methods.name: collapse
methods.desc: Hides the dropdown list if it is currently expanded. Fires the 'collapse' event on completion.

methods.name: getValue
methods.desc: Returns the currently selected field value or empty string if no value is set.

methods.name: selectByValue
methods.desc:
Select an item in the dropdown list by its data value. This function does NOT cause the select event to fire.
The store must be loaded and the list expanded for this function to work, otherwise use setValue.

params.name: value
params.desc: The data value of the item to select

params.name: scrollIntoView
params.desc:
False to prevent the dropdown list from autoscrolling to display the
selected item if it is not currently in view (defaults to true)

methods.name: setValue
methods.desc:
Sets the specified value into the field.  If the value finds a match, the corresponding record text
will be displayed in the field.  If the value does not match the data value of an existing item,
and the valueNotFoundText config option is defined, it will be displayed as the default field text.
Otherwise the field will be blank (although the value will still be set).

methods.name: setFromData
methods.desc: Sets the value of the field based on a object which is related to the record format for the store.

params.name: value
params.desc: the value to set as. or false on reset?

methods.name: setEditable
methods.desc:
Allow or prevent the user from directly editing the field text.  If false is passed,
the user will only be able to select from the items defined in the dropdown list.  This method
is the runtime equivalent of setting the 'editable' config option at config time.

params.name: value
params.desc: True to allow the user to directly edit the field text

methods.name: clearValue
methods.desc: Clears any text/value currently set in the field

methods.name: isExpanded
methods.desc: Returns true if the dropdown list is expanded, else false.

methods.name: doQuery
methods.desc:
Execute a query to filter the dropdown list.  Fires the beforequery event prior to performing the
query allowing the query action to be canceled if needed.

params.name: forceAll
params.desc:
True to force the query to execute even if there are currently fewer characters
in the field than the minimum specified by the minChars config option.  It also clears any filter previously
saved in the current store (defaults to false)

methods.name: onTriggerClick
methods.desc:
The function that should handle the trigger's click event.  This method does nothing by default until overridden
by an implementing function.

methods.name: clearInvalid
methods.desc: Clear any invalid styles/messages for this field

methods.name: validate
methods.desc: Validates the field value

methods.name: markInvalid
methods.desc: Mark this field as invalid

methods.name: getRawValue
methods.desc: Returns the raw data value which may or may not be a valid, defined value.  To return a normalized value see {@link #getValue}.

methods.name: markValid
methods.desc: Mark this field as valid

methods.name: getName
methods.desc: Returns the name of the field

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets the current field value to the originally loaded value and clears any validation messages

methods.name: setRawValue
methods.desc: Sets the underlying DOM field's value directly, bypassing validation.  To set the value with validation see {@link #setValue}.

methods.name: inputEl
methods.desc: return the real input element.

methods.name: validateValue
methods.desc:
Validates a value according to the field's validation rules and marks the field as invalid
if the validation fails

methods.name: tooltipEl
methods.desc: Fetch the element to display the tooltip on.

methods.name: hide
methods.desc: Hide a component - adds 'hidden' class

methods.name: show
methods.desc: Show a component - removes 'hidden' class

methods.name: setVisibilityEl
methods.desc: Set the element that will be used to show or hide

methods.name: getVisibilityEl
methods.desc: Get the element that will be used to show or hide

methods.name: initEvents
methods.desc: Initialize Events for the element

methods.name: getChildContainer
methods.desc: Fetch the element to add children to

methods.name: getId
methods.desc: Returns the id of this component.

methods.name: render
methods.desc: If this is a lazy rendering component, render it to its container element.

params.name: container
params.desc: (optional) The element this component should be rendered into. If it is being applied to existing markup, this should be left off.

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc:
Destroys this component by purging any event listeners, removing the component's element from the DOM,
removing the component from its {@link Roo.Container} (if applicable) and unregistering it from {@link Roo.ComponentMgr}.

methods.name: isVisible
methods.desc: Returns true if this component is visible.

methods.name: setDisabled
methods.desc: Convenience function for setting disabled/enabled by boolean.

methods.name: focus
methods.desc: Try to focus this component.

params.name: selectText
params.desc: True to also select the text in this component (if applicable)

methods.name: enable
methods.desc: Enable this component.

methods.name: setVisible
methods.desc: Convenience function to hide or show this component by boolean.

params.name: visible
params.desc: True to show, false to hide

methods.name: disable
methods.desc: Disable this component.

methods.name: getEl
methods.desc: Returns the underlying {@link Roo.Element}.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: *edit
events.desc: Fires when the 'edit' icon is pressed (add a listener to enable add button)

params.name: record
params.desc: The data record returned from the underlying store (or false on nothing selected)

events.name: *afterremove
events.desc: Fires when the remove value from the combobox array

events.name: *touchviewdisplay
events.desc: Fires when touch view require special display (default is using displayField)

events.name: *beforequery
events.desc:
Fires before all queries are processed. Return false to cancel the query or set cancel to true.
The event object passed has these properties:

events.name: *remove
events.desc: Fires when the remove value from the combobox array

events.name: *beforeselect
events.desc: Fires before a list item is selected. Return false to cancel the selection.

params.name: record
params.desc: The data record returned from the underlying store

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the selected item in the dropdown list

events.name: *tick
events.desc: Fires when tick the element

events.name: *add
events.desc: Fires when the 'add' icon is pressed (add a listener to enable add button)

events.name: *expand
events.desc: Fires when the dropdown list is expanded

events.name: *specialfilter
events.desc: Fires when specialfilter

events.name: *collapse
events.desc: Fires when the dropdown list is collapsed

events.name: *select
events.desc: Fires when a list item is selected

params.name: record
params.desc: The data record returned from the underlying store (or false on clear)

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the selected item in the dropdown list

events.name: *change
events.desc: Fires just before the field blurs if the field value has changed.

events.name: *invalid
events.desc: Fires after the field has been marked as invalid.

events.name: *valid
events.desc: Fires after the field has been validated with no errors.

events.name: *blur
events.desc: Fires when this field loses input focus.

events.name: *specialkey
events.desc:
Fires when any key related to navigation (arrows, tab, enter, esc, etc.) is pressed.  You can check
{@link Roo.EventObject#getKey} to determine which key was pressed.

events.name: *focus
events.desc: Fires when this field receives input focus.

events.name: *keyup
events.desc: Fires after the key up

events.name: *childrenrendered
events.desc: Fires when the children have been rendered..

events.name: *beforerender
events.desc: Fires before the component is rendered. Return false to stop the render.

events.name: *disable
events.desc: Fires after the component is disabled.

events.name: *render
events.desc: Fires after the component is rendered.

events.name: *destroy
events.desc: Fires after the component is destroyed.

events.name: *hide
events.desc: Fires after the component is hidden.

events.name: *beforehide
events.desc: Fires before the component is hidden. Return false to stop the hide.

events.name: *show
events.desc: Fires after the component is shown.

events.name: *beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before the component is shown.  Return false to stop the show.

events.name: *enable
events.desc: Fires after the component is enabled.

events.name: *beforedestroy
events.desc: Fires before the component is destroyed. Return false to stop the destroy.
